parsed.title: Um boneco, um mito: da prensa ao brinquedo
parsed.summary: Um simples boneco de plástico reproduz a pose de um santo infantil do século XV, cuja imagem foi usada para espalhar ódio antijudaico. Hoje, milhões de crianças brincam com esse brinquedo, enquanto a lenda original ainda alimenta discursos de terror. O que conecta uma gravura de incunábulo a um brinquedo moderno? The Gap Files revela a cadeia invisível que transforma injustiça histórica em consumo cotidiano.

scenes.narration: Um boneco de plástico imita um santo infantil assassinado – ninguém entende por quê.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, plastic figurine perched on a worn wooden shelf, single cold spotlight casting deep shadows, subtle dust motes floating in the beam, the figure's hands clasped like a medieval martyr, muted color palette of greys and faint rust.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the figurine, dust particles drifting through the light beam
scenes.audioDescription: soft low drone hum, faint distant church bell echo, subtle wind rustle

scenes.narration: A mesma imagem surgiu em livros de imprensa do século XV, espalhando ódio.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, open medieval printing desk, candle flame flickering over a woodcut page depicting the martyr, the page beside a modern toy box, shadows dancing on the stone wall, muted amber tones.
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle pan right across the desk, then slow zoom into the woodcut illustration
scenes.audioDescription: candle crackle, soft rustle of parchment, low tension string hum

scenes.narration: Hoje, milhões de crianças brincam com ele, enquanto a lenda ainda alimenta discursos de terror.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, contemporary living room dimly lit, children’s hands blurred as they move a plastic martyr figurine across a carpet, shadows cast long, background wall faintly shows a historic print silhouette, muted cool blues and deep shadows.
scenes.motionDescription: Subtle tilt up as the toy rotates slowly on the floor
scenes.audioDescription: distant children’s laughter echoing, underlying subtle heartbeat rhythm, faint tension strings

scenes.narration: The Gap Files. O eco da história continua, invisível, aguardando seu olhar.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black background with faint glowing text "The Gap Files." centered, a barely visible silhouette of the figurine fades behind the letters, soft vignette edges.
scenes.motionDescription: Static frame with a slow fade‑in of the text, subtle light pulse around the letters
scenes.audioDescription: low heartbeat rhythm fading to silence

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
